biotools.summary: EvoRator employs machine-learning for prediction of residue-level evolutionary rates from protein structure. This prediction is based on various features comprising the structural information characterizing the protein.

bioschemas.name: EvoRator
bioschemas.summary: EvoRator employs machine-learning for prediction of residue-level evolutionary rates from protein structure. This prediction is based on various features comprising the structural information characterizing the protein.
